info.title: Azure Machine Learning Workspaces
info.description: These APIs allow end users to operate on Azure Machine Learning Workspace resources.

get.summary: Gets a batch inference deployment by id.

patch.summary: Updates a batch job inference deployment.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Batch inference job deployment definition object.

get.summary: Gets a batch inference job deployment by id.

post.summary: Creates a batch job inference deployment.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Batch inference job deployment definition object.

get.summary: Lists Batch inference job deployments in the workspace.

patch.summary: Updates a batch job inference endpoint.

get.summary: Gets a batch inference job endpoint by id.

post.summary: Creates a batch job inference endpoint.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Batch inference job endpoint definition object.

get.summary: Lists Batch inference job endpoints in the workspace.
Lists Batch inference deployments in the workspace.
Gets a batch inference endpoint by name.
Lists Batch inference endpoint in the workspace.

LocationNameParameter.name: locationName
LocationNameParameter.description: location of Azure Machine Learning workspace.

EndpointNameParameter.name: endpointName
EndpointNameParameter.description: Name of the Azure Machine Learning Batch Inference endpoint.

EndpointDeploymentIdParameter.name: deploymentId
EndpointDeploymentIdParameter.description: Identifier of the Azure Machine Learning Batch Inference Deployment.

BatchJobIdParameter.name: jobId
BatchJobIdParameter.description: Identifier of the Azure Machine Learning Batch Inference job.

id.description: The resource URL of the entity (not URL encoded).

name.description: The name of the resource entity.

location.description: Specifies the location of the resource.

tags.description: Contains resource tags defined as key/value pairs.

id.description: The resource URL of the entity (not URL encoded).

name.description: The name of the resource entity.

location.description: Specifies the location of the resource.

tags.description: Contains resource tags defined as key/value pairs.

BatchRetrySettings.description: Retry settings for a batch inference operation.

maximumRetries.description: Maximum retry count for a mini-batch

timeoutInSeconds.description: Invocation timeout for a mini-batch, in seconds.

BatchPartitioningScheme.description: Partitioning scheme for batch inference operation.

partitioningKey.description: Partition key used for Named partitioning.

miniBatchSize.description:
Size of the mini-batch passed to each batch invocation.
For FileDataset, this is the number of files per mini-batch.
For TabularDataset, this is the size of the records in bytes, per mini-batch.

BatchLoggingLevel.description:
Log verbosity for batch inferencing.
Increasing verbosity order for logging is : Warning, Info and Debug
Default value is Info.

BatchOutputAction.description: Enum to determine how batch inferencing will handle output

appendRowFileName.description: Customized output file name for append_row output action.

nodeCount.description: Number of Compute nodes to be used for running the deployment

properties.description: Property dictionary. Properties can be added, but not removed or altered.

environmentId.description: Environment specification for the endpoint deployment.

properties.description: Property dictionary. Properties can be added, but not removed or altered.

trafficRules.description: Traffic rules on how the traffic will be routed across deployments.

codeArtifactId.description: The ID of the code asset.

command.description: The command to execute on startup of the job.

computeType.description: Compute Configuration type such as ACI, AKS, or AMLCompute

BatchDeploymentSettings.description: Batch inference specific settings per deployment.

errorThreshold.description:
Error threshold, if the error count for the entire input goes above this value,
the batch inference will be aborted. Range is [-1, int.MaxValue]
-1 value indicates, ignore all failures during batch inference
For FileDataset count of file failures
For TabularDataset, this is the count of record failures

tags.description: Contains resource tags defined as key/value pairs.

properties.description: Property dictionary. Properties can be added, but not removed or altered.

errorThreshold.description:
Error threshold, if the error count for the entire input goes above this value,
the batch inference will be aborted. Range is [-1, int.MaxValue]
-1 value indicates, ignore all failures during batch inference
For FileDataset count of file failures
For TabularDataset, this is the count of record failures

id.description: The resource URL of the entity (not URL encoded).

name.description: The name of the resource entity.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Profile, endpoint, etc.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list Resource Provider operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of Resource Provider operations supported by the Resource Provider resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.
